data.name: Shonen Adventure : The Dual Blades Hero
data.detailed_description:
By playing this game you will begin a new journey in a fantasy dimension. You will start this adventure with only one thing : the potential to become the strongest hero.
This VR RPG is a real challenge: explore the world, level up, unlock powerful elemental skills, sell your loot, buy items to increase specific stats and more.

In parallel with this adventure, you will also be able to rank yourself among all the other players and try to reach the top by clearing instances as fast as possible.
Train yourself, test multiple builds and try to be the best dual blades hero.

Note that you will have the choice between smooth rotation and instant rotation but there is no teleportation system for the movements.

Don't hesitate to join my discord server if you want to leave feedback, suggest new features, balancing adjustments or report bugs !
https://discord.gg/rCCNuzDu4D

Finally I would like to give some thanks, I'm extremely grateful to the people who supported me during this long journey. Especially to the people who accepted to test the game, your feedback helped me so much to improve, it was awesome, thank you !
data.about_the_game:
By playing this game you will begin a new journey in a fantasy dimension. You will start this adventure with only one thing : the potential to become the strongest hero.
This VR RPG is a real challenge: explore the world, level up, unlock powerful elemental skills, sell your loot, buy items to increase specific stats and more.

In parallel with this adventure, you will also be able to rank yourself among all the other players and try to reach the top by clearing instances as fast as possible.
Train yourself, test multiple builds and try to be the best dual blades hero.

Note that you will have the choice between smooth rotation and instant rotation but there is no teleportation system for the movements.

Don't hesitate to join my discord server if you want to leave feedback, suggest new features, balancing adjustments or report bugs !

Finally I would like to give some thanks, I'm extremely grateful to the people who supported me during this long journey. Especially to the people who accepted to test the game, your feedback helped me so much to improve, it was awesome, thank you !
data.short_description: Explore multiple worlds, fight creatures, level up, unlock powerful elemental skills, sell your loot, buy items to increase specific stats and more. Start from the bottom and become a hero with the shonen spirit. You can also rank yourself among all the other players and try to reach the top.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 5600
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700F or AMD Ryzen 7 1700X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 or Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
